original: Ehrenborg, Theodor, major, Halm-Stad, f. 4/2/87 i Stoby, Krist. 1., av major Casper E. o. Hilda Santesson. G. 15 m. Amelie Harriet Susanna Tham. Barn: Fredrik f. 15, Amelie 17, Susanna 22. — Stud :ex. i Lund 07, off:ex. 10. Und:.löjtn. v. Hall. reg. 10, löjtn. 15, kapt. 25, major 36. Hemv:- of’f. 40, Kgl. Maj:ts omb. i styr. f. Hall. skytteförb. 32-45, sekr. i Röda korsets Hall.-avd. sed. 36. Hobby: gammak si’lver. RSO, RVO, SvRKSM, Lands’t :GM, SvsbfSM, Halil.-Nordv. Skånes landst:förb. GM, Halk skvtte-förb :GM, Skyttem.’
translated:
Ehrenborg, Theodor was a major born on February 4, 1887 in Stoby, Kristianstad County, Sweden. His parents were Major Casper E. and Hilda Santesson. He married Amelie Harriet Susanna Tham in 1915 and they had three children: Fredrik (born in 1915), Amelie (born in 1917), and Susanna (born in 1922).

Theodor passed his studentexamen in Lund in 1907 and his officersexamen in 1910. He served as a lieutenant in the Halland Regiment from 1910, became a captain in 1925, and was promoted to major in 1936. He served as a home guard officer from 1940, and was a member of the Swedish shooting union's board of directors for Halland from 1932 to 1945. He was also the secretary of the Halland division of the Red Cross since 1936.

Theodor's hobby was collecting old silver. He was the recipient of several honors, including RSO, RVO, SvRKSM, Lands't:GM, SvsbfSM, Halland-Nordv. Skånes landst:förb. GM, and Halk skvtte-förb:GM. He was a member of the shooting club.

memberOf.name: Swedish shooting union's board of directors for Halland
